typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FREQ as string,
		RETAILER as string,
		DATE_ID as string,
		EA_UPC as string,
		K_DESC_E as string,
		K_DESC_F as string,
		BRAND as string,
		BRAND_DESC as string,
		BRAND_FUNC as string,
		UN_STORE as string,
		STORE_ID as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		PROVINCE as string,
		POSTAL_CODE as string,
		SCAN_QTY as string,
		DOLLARS_SOLD as string,
		BANNER_NAME as string,
		LOAD_DATE as timestamp,
		UPDATE_DATE as timestamp,
		DATA_SOURCE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'table') ~> BlobPOSSource
BlobPOSSource split(DATE_ID>0,
	DATE_ID>1,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(POSLoad, StoreLoad, Other)
